product_name: FuelBelt The Wedge Hydration Waistpack - 2014 Overstock
long_description: A simple way to transport a little extra fluid while training, the Wedge water bottle attaches to your waistband so you can enjoy running without the hassle of holding a bottle in your hand.
short_description: A simple way to transport a little extra fluid while training, the Wedge water bottle attaches to your waistband so you can enjoy running without the hassle of holding a bottle in your hand.
